name: Make-up and Style
overview: Become a makeup artist! Allow your creativity to run wild as a famous makeup artist with realistic makeup tools. You can even create a 3D face – simply take picture of your face, place it onto a 3D face and apply makeup. Complete various missions and become a professional makeup artist. Features: - Create thousands of different faces - Use the stylus to precisely apply makeup to the 3D face - 16 types of makeup tools including brushes, mascara, lipsticks and eye pencils - 23 missions with a humorous storyline in Career mode
